Prefect Karukia: I, Prefect Karukia, am the daughter of the proud *Atuba, the tribe of the wolf*. What do you want from me? It is the will of Paagrio that has sent you to me, Karukia! I respect the will of Paagrio, and will aid you any way that I can! [npc_%objectId%_Chat 1|Ask about the tribe of the wolf] [npc_%objectId%_SkillList|Learn Skills] [npc_%objectId%_Quest|Quest]
